00001 <h2>Reclaim your free SMS!</h2>
00002 <p class="centered">
00003         <img id="screenshot" style="margin: 10px" src="/assets/images/software/widgets/websms/websms_screenshot-1.4.png" alt="WebSMS Widget - Valentina - Mi ami? Ma quanto mi ami?? E... mi pensi? Ma quanto mi pensi??" />
00004 </p>
00005 <p>
00006         WebSMS is a Dashboard widget to send free SMS messages through carriers&rsquo;
00007         web sites<span style="vertical-align:super;font-size:75%">(<a href="#note-1">1</a>)</span> in a convenient way.
00008 </p>
00009 <p>
00010         Aren&rsquo;t you tired of opening the web browser, clicking through dozens of redundant pages,
00011         filled with useless informations and graphics, typing the recipient&rsquo;s number by hand,
00012         before actually sending an SMS?
00013         How many free SMS you didn&rsquo;t send just because it was damn boring?
00014 </p>
00015 <h3>Features</h3>
00016 <p id="feature-addressbook">
00017         WebSMS is integrated with your Address Book: all your mobile contacts
00018         are available in the contacts list. But there&rsquo;s more: WebSMS will automatically complete
00019         the number that you are typing if it matches one of your        contacts.
00020 </p>
00021 <p id="feature-secure">
00022         WebSMS securely stores your account passwords in the system Keychain, so they are safely
00023         hidden from malicious access.
00024 </p>
00025 <p id="feature-translation">
00026         Thanks to <a href="http://code.google.com/apis/ajaxlanguage/" class="external">Google AJAX Language API</a>,
00027         WebSMS can automatically translate your message to another language, just hitting a key.
00028 </p>
00029 <p id="feature-swupdate">
00030         WebSMS alerts you when there&rsquo;s an updated version, and
00031         it can also update installed plugins when a newer version is available!
00032 </p>
00033 <p>
00034         WebSMS requires Mac OS X 10.4 "Tiger" or later and an Internet connection (broadband recommended).
00035 </p>
00036 <p>
00037         WebSMS is completely free and released under an Open Source license.
00038         If you&rsquo;d like to contribute to the project, write a plugin for an unsupported carrier,
00039         make a donation to support development, or just drop a line to suggest a new feature,
00040         don&rsquo;t hesitate to
00041         <?php echo $this->link_to('contact me', array('controller' => 'contact')); ?>.
00042 </p>
00043 
00044 <ol id="footnotes">
00045         <li>
00046         <a name="note-1"></a>
00047                 WebSMS is already compatible with several national and international
00048                 phone carrier services (see the
00049                 <a href="http://websms.origo.ethz.ch/wiki/available_plugins" class="external">list of available plugins</a>).
00050                 All the names and logos belong to the respective owners.
00051                 <br /><br />
00052                 Some services supported by WebSMS may require a paid account in order to send messages.
00053                 Please inform yourself on the costs of the service before using WebSMS.
00054         </li>
00055 </ol>
